com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue

Interface KeyColumnValueStoreManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BufferMutationKeyColumnValueStore, StoreManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCassandraStoreManager, AstyanaxStoreManager, CassandraEmbeddedStoreManager, CassandraThriftStoreManager, HBaseStoreManager, InMemoryStorageAdapter, InMemoryStoreManager, KeyValueStoreManagerAdapter

    public interface KeyColumnValueStoreManager
extends BufferMutationKeyColumnValueStore, StoreManager
    KeyColumnValueStoreManager provides the persistence context to the graph database middleware.

    A KeyColumnValueStoreManager provides transaction handles across multiple data stores that are managed by this KeyColumnValueStoreManager.

    Author:
    Matthias Bröcheler (me@matthiasb.com);

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      KeyColumnValueStore openDatabase(String name)
      Opens an ordered database by the given name.

    • Method Detail

      • openDatabase

        KeyColumnValueStore openDatabase(String name)
                                 throws StorageException
        Opens an ordered database by the given name. If the database does not exist, it is created. If it has already been opened, the existing handle is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of database
        Returns:
        Database Handle
        Throws:
        StorageException
